dct_description_sm: compiled from the field notes of the official re-survey made by Wm. M. Eddy, surveyor of the town of San Francisco ; drawn by Alex. Zakrzewski ; lithographed by F. Michelin.
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1849 by Henry Reed."
